column2: 2018 We made a huge discovery of the top 50 places to eat in Chicago list... at the Revival Food Hall on Clark St 4 places are in there! Â  They didn't have the recommended Ribs at this location but I would recommend the Beef Brisket. It was perfect and not fatty like other places I've been. Smoque we had the Beef Brisket Sandwich with the recommended Carolina and Memphis Sauces
